Should'nt {{champion:421}} be free to play this week?
All of the new champs are eventually featured, but that doesn't mean they're always featured 2-3 rotations after they're released. However, {{champion:421}} will prob be free2play next week.
Ever since {{champion:114}} all champions have been free to play 3 weeks after they're released. WHAT IS THIS?!
3weeks after launch
